comment: Hello Gab world. Another Facebook &Twitter refugee seeking liberty & chasing the "free to say whatever the fuck I want to say" dream. Became disgusted with Facebook & closed my account earlier this year. Original Twitter account permanently suspended for something ridiculous (see pictures) Using new account to harass Twatter until they suspend it too.
